biotools.summary: pepsickle is an open-source command line tool for proteasomal cleavage prediction. pepsickle is designed with flexibility in mind allows for the use of either direct amino acid sequences or the use of FASTA files. Predictions can also be determined based on a variety of available models including those trained on: in-vivo epitope data (default), in-vitro constitutive proteasome data, or in-vitro immunoproteasome data.
